segments.text: This kitchen setup seems so ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window brightens the counters and sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's in her apron, methodically drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the faucet's pouring water uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing onto the floor, creating a hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are raiding the cookie jar without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on a shaky stool, risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister assists, hand out for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mess disgusts me, water everywhere unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden thrives neatly and undisturbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's missing all this, focused solely on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a recipe for accident in this cozy space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a mix of concern and irritation watching.
segments.speaker: PAR
